mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bord_catg, bord_titl, bord_cont, user_id, bord_date, bord_hitc, bord_wrip) VALUES (#{bordCatg},#{bordTitl},#{bordCont},#{userId},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,0,#{bordWrip})
mapper.select: SELECT b.bord_id, b.bord_catg, c.catg_name, b.bord_titl, b.bord_cont, b.user_id, u.nickname, b.bord_date, b.bord_hitc, b.bord_wrip FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.bord_catg = c.catg_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.bord_id = #{bordId}
SELECT catg_id, catg_name, catg_crdt FROM category ORDER BY catg_name
SELECT catg_name FROM category WHERE catg_id = #{catgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file (bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm) VALUES (#{bordId},#{fileOlnm},#{fileSvnm})
mapper.select: SELECT file_id, bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm, file_date FROM board_file WHERE bord_id = #{bordId}
SELECT bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm, file_date FROM board_file WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
SELECT COUNT(comm_id) cnt FROM board_comment WHERE bord_id = #{bordId}

SELECT a.comm_id, a.bord_id, a.user_id, a.isCreated, a.nickname, a.comm_cont, a.comm_date, a.cnt FROM ( SELECT c.comm_id, c.bord_id, c.user_id, c.user_id = #{userId} isCreated, u.nickname, c.comm_cont, c.comm_date, (SELECT COUNT(comm_id) FROM board_comment WHERE bord_id = #{bordId} ) cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER() rnum FROM board_comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.bord_id = #{bordId} ORDER BY c.comm_date ASC ) a WHERE a.rnum > #{startRow} LIMIT #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (bord_id, user_id, comm_cont) VALUES (#{bordId},#{userId},#{commCont})
